languages.text: "Да, Касс, не хочу тебя пугать... но, когда я думаю о тебе, я слышу смех. Смех много более древний, чем само Человечество... и наводящий жуть. Не думаю, что смеется этот кто-то вместе с нами — скорее над".

"Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."
languages.original_text: "Да, Касс, не хочу тебя пугать... но, когда я думаю о тебе, я слышу смех. Смех много более древний, чем само Человечество... и наводящий жуть. Не думаю, что смеется этот кто-то вместе с нами — скорее над".

traits.locale_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."

traits.locale_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，小卡，我不想吓唬你……可当我想你的事情时，我听到了笑声。那笑声比人类本身更加古老……令我脊背发冷。我不认为它是在与我们一同欢笑，它更可能是在嘲笑我们。”
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，小卡，我不想吓唬你……可当我想你的事情时，我听到了笑声。那笑声比人类本身更加古老……令我脊背发冷。我不认为它是在与我们一同欢笑，它更可能是在嘲笑我们。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Sans vouloir vous faire peur, Cass... quand je pense à vous, je n'entends que des rires. Des rires bien plus anciens que l'humanité elle-même... et qui me donnent des frissons. Et le pire, c'est que celui qui rit ne rit pas avec nous, non... il se moque de nous. »
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."

traits.locale_text: « Sans vouloir vous faire peur, Cass... quand je pense à vous, je n'entends que des rires. Des rires bien plus anciens que l'humanité elle-même... et qui me donnent des frissons. Et le pire, c'est que celui qui rit ne rit pas avec nous, non... il se moque de nous. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Esto, Cass, no quiero meterte miedo, pero... cuando pienso en ti, oigo risas. Risas mucho más antiguas que la propia Humanidad... Risas que me dan escalofríos. No creo que se ría con nosotros. Se ríe de nosotros».
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."

traits.locale_text: «Esto, Cass, no quiero meterte miedo, pero... cuando pienso en ti, oigo risas. Risas mucho más antiguas que la propia Humanidad... Risas que me dan escalofríos. No creo que se ría con nosotros. Se ríe de nosotros».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「そうよ、キャス。怖がらせるつもりはないけど…あなたのことを考えると、笑い声が聞こえるの。人間よりもずっと遠い時代の笑い声が…私の背筋をぞっとさせるのよ。誰かが私たちと笑っているわけではなくて…私たちのことを笑ってるという方が近いわ」
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."

traits.locale_text: 「そうよ、キャス。怖がらせるつもりはないけど…あなたのことを考えると、笑い声が聞こえるの。人間よりもずっと遠い時代の笑い声が…私の背筋をぞっとさせるのよ。誰かが私たちと笑っているわけではなくて…私たちのことを笑ってるという方が近いわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, Cass, ich will Euch keine Angst machen ... doch wenn ich an Euch denke, höre ich Gelächter. Gelächter, das älter ist als die Menschheit selbst ... Gelächter, bei dem es mir kalt den Rücken hinunterläuft. Ich glaube nicht, dass jemand mit uns lacht ... eher über uns."
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Cass, ich will Euch keine Angst machen ... doch wenn ich an Euch denke, höre ich Gelächter. Gelächter, das älter ist als die Menschheit selbst ... Gelächter, bei dem es mir kalt den Rücken hinunterläuft. Ich glaube nicht, dass jemand mit uns lacht ... eher über uns."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."

languages.text: "Evet Cass. Seni korkutmak istemem ama... Seni her düşündüğümde kahkahalar duyuyorum. İnsanlıktan da eskiye dayanan, tüylerimi diken diken eden kahkahalar. Gülen tarafın biz olduğumuzu sanmıyorum, daha çok gülünen tarafız gibi."
languages.original_text: "Yeah, Cass, I don't want to scare you... but when I think about you, I hear laughter. Laughter far more ancient than Humanity itself... laughter that sends a chill down my spine. I don't think it's someone laughing with us — more like at us."

traits.locale_text: "Evet Cass. Seni korkutmak istemem ama... Seni her düşündüğümde kahkahalar duyuyorum. İnsanlıktan da eskiye dayanan, tüylerimi diken diken eden kahkahalar. Gülen tarafın biz olduğumuzu sanmıyorum, daha çok gülünen tarafız gibi."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
